spec_data.Name: couchdb
spec_data.Description:
Apache CouchDB is a distributed, fault-tolerant and schema-free
document-oriented database accessible via a RESTful HTTP/JSON API.
Among other features, it provides robust, incremental replication
with bi-directional conflict detection and resolution, and is
queryable and indexable using a table-oriented view engine with
JavaScript acting as the default view definition language.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 25 Jul 2017 12:10:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A document database server, accessible via a RESTful JSON API
